title: The Contender 1944 (Drama, Sport) Buster Crabbe, Arline Judge, Julie Gibson | Film

sources.title: The Contender 1944 (Drama, Sport) Buster Crabbe, Arline Judge, Julie Gibson | Film
sources.description:
Courage in the ring, heart beyond measure: the contender steps into history!
In order to get some extra money to send his son to military school, a truck driver turns amateur boxer. His success in that field convinces him take up the sport full-time, and he soon fights his way up to where he becomes a contender for the Heavyweight Championship. However, his chance at the title is endangered when he starts tasting the "good life" of nightclubs, partying and alcohol.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/c8mb9XoEgTU


Original title: The Contender (1944) AKA: Challenger
This film is subtitled in many languages.


Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: George Wallace Sayre, Jay Doten 
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Arline Judge, Julie Gibson
Genres: Classic Film, Action, Drama, Sport


@CultCinemaClassics

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYDDUshEcMs1CHZW1booguo
